snippet.title: Sons of Valhalla - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the new Sons of Valhalla gameplay trailer for the upcoming Viking RPG strategy game. Take charge as Thorald Olavson, the son of a Viking Jarl, and head to England to raise an army and exact revenge on those who have wronged you. Build fortresses, gather warriors, and more in this tactical 2D side-scroller. Sons of Valhalla will be released in 2024 on PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #SonsOfValhalla
